name: Turbo Tavern (DEMO)
description:
This game is a work in progress! And a demo for our university project!

Turbo Tavern is a diner dash meets hack n slash where you play as Manager, who was forced into the Manager role at the Turbo Tavern. 

You must take orders from customers and then go out into the wild to hunt the different ingredients all to eventually bring them back and help cook the food using combos that appear on the screen. 

Interact with Bell in the tavern to take you to the training area! And talking to Chef saves your game!
